 18#define VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(expr)			\
 19  vsip::impl::Compile_time_assert<expr>::test();
 20
 21

 23/***********************************************************************
 24  Declarations
 25***********************************************************************/
 26
 27namespace vsip
 28{
 29namespace impl
 30{
 31
 32
 33/// Compile_time_assert is a base class for creating compile-time checks.
 34///
 35/// It takes a single boolean template parameter, and works by only
 36/// providing a specialization for true.  Attempting to instantiate a
 37/// Compile_time_assert<false> or call Compile_time_assert<false>::test()
 38/// causes a compile-time error.
 39///
 40/// It can be used two ways:
 41///  - First, a concept check class can derive from Compile_time_assert,
 42///    passing a boolean expression to template parameter B.
 43///    For an example, see Assert_unsigned below.
 44///
 45///  - Second, code can form a compile-time assertion that EXPR is
 46///    true the macro VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT, which in turn tries
 47///    to call Compile_time_assert<EXPR>::test(). If EXPR is true,
 48///    this results in a no-op.  If EXPR is is false, this results
 49///    in a compilation error.
 50///
 51template <bool B>
 52struct Compile_time_assert;
 53
 54
 55// specialize for true
 56template <>
 57struct Compile_time_assert<true>
 58{
 59  static void test() {}
 60};
 61
 62// no specialization for false -- this triggers compile-time error.
 63
 64
 65
 66/// Compile_time_assert_msg
 67template <bool B,
 68	  typename MsgT>
 69struct Compile_time_assert_msg;
 70
 71template <typename MsgT>
 72struct Compile_time_assert_msg<true, MsgT>
 73{
 74  static void test() {}
 75};
 76
 77
 78
 79/// Assert_unsigned<T> checks that type T is an unsigned at compile-time.
 80template<typename T> 
 81struct Is_unsigned
 82{
 83  static bool const value = (0 < T(-1));
 84};
 85
 86template<typename T> 
 87struct Is_const
 88{
 89  static bool const value = false;
 90};
 91template<typename T> 
 92struct Is_const<T const>
 93{
 94  static bool const value = true;
 95};
 96
 97template <typename T>
 98struct Assert_unsigned : Compile_time_assert<Is_unsigned<T>::value>
 99{};
100
101template <typename T> struct Assert_const;
102template <typename T> struct Assert_const<T const> {};
103
104template <typename T> struct Assert_non_const {};
105template <typename T> struct Assert_non_const<T const>;
106
107} // namespace vsip::impl
108} // namespace vsip
109
110#endif // VSIP_CORE_STATIC_ASSERT_HPP
